entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 2.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sarnia Chris Hadfield Airport 09:00 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 2.8°C
Pressure: 100.3 kPa
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 94 %
Dewpoint: 1.9°C
Wind: ESE 30 km/h gust 45 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Thursday: Rain or snow. High 6.
entry.summary: Snow or ice pellets changing to rain this morning and ending early this afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of drizzle. Fog patches developing this afternoon. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early this afternoon. High 6. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Showers or drizzle. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of drizzle early this evening. A few rain showers beginning this evening then changing to 60 percent chance of flurries or drizzle after midnight. Fog patches dissipating this evening. Wind becoming west 30 km/h after midnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
